event.name: onabort
event.description: Fires when the loading of the element is cancelled before it finishes loading.

event.name: onactivate
event.description: Fires when the element becomes active.

event.name: onafterprint
event.description: Fires immediately after a user prints or print previews a document.

event.name: onafterupdate
event.description: Fires when the data from a datasource is successfully updated for a databound object.

event.name: onbeforeactivate
event.description: Fires immediately before the element becomes active.

event.name: onbeforecopy
event.description: Fires immediately before the selection is copied to the clipboard.

event.name: onbeforecut
event.description: Fires immediately before the selection is cut to the clipboard.

event.name: onbeforedeactivate
event.description: Fires immediately before the element stops being the active element.

event.name: onbeforeeditfocus
event.description: Fires immediately before the element receives focus prior to being edited.

event.name: onbeforepaste
event.description: Fires immediately before the selection is pasted from the clipboard to the element.

event.name: onbeforeprint
event.description: Fires immediately before a user prints or print previews a document.

event.name: onbeforeunload
event.description: Fires immediately before a document is unloaded.

event.name: onbeforeupdate
event.description: Fires immediately before the data from a datasource is updated for a databound object.

event.name: onblur
event.description: Fires when the element loses focus.

event.name: onbounce
event.description: Fires immediately before the scrolling contents of an element reach the far side of the window.

event.name: oncanplay
event.description: Fires when media can start play, but might has to stop for buffering

event.name: oncanplaythrough
event.description: Fires when media can be played to the end, without stopping for buffering

event.name: oncellchange
event.description: Fires when the data from the datasource changes.

event.name: onchange
event.description: Fires when the value of the element changes.

event.name: onclick
event.description: Fires when the element is clicked.

event.name: oncontextmenu
event.description: Fires when the element is right-clicked and the context menu opens.

event.name: oncontrolselect
event.description: Fires immediately before the element is selected.

event.name: oncopy
event.description: Fires when the element is copied to the clipboard.

event.name: oncut
event.description: Fires when the element is cut to the clipboard.

event.name: ondataavailable
event.description: Fires when data becomes available from an asyncrhonous data source.

event.name: ondatasetchanged
event.description: Fires when data in a dataset changes.

event.name: ondatasetcomplete
event.description: Fires when a dataset finishes loading.

event.name: ondblclick
event.description: Fires when the element is double-clicked.

event.name: ondeactivate
event.description: Fires when the active element becomes inactive.

event.name: ondrag
event.description: Fires when the element is dragged.

event.name: ondragend
event.description: Fires when the element is released from being dragged.

event.name: ondragenter
event.description: Fires when the element has another object dragged onto it that can be dropped on the element.

event.name: ondragleave
event.description: Fires when an element has an object dragged out of it that could be dropped onto the element.

event.name: ondragover
event.description: Fires when an element has an object dragged over it that could be dropped onto the element.

event.name: ondragstart
event.description: Fires immediately before an element is dragged.

event.name: ondrop
event.description: Fires when an object is dropped onto the element.

event.name: ondurationchange
event.description: Fires when the length of the media is changed

event.name: onemptied
event.description: Fires when a media resource element suddenly becomes empty (network errors, errors on load etc.)

event.name: onended
event.description: Fires when media has reach the end

event.name: onerror
event.description: Fires when an error occurs with the object associated with the element.

event.name: onerrorupdate
event.description: Fires when an error occurs while updating the datasource of a databound object.

event.name: onfilterchange
event.description: Fires when the CSS Filter of an element changes or finishes transitioning.

event.name: onfinish
event.description: Fires when looping for the element completes.

event.name: onfocus
event.description: Fires when the element receives focus.

event.name: onformchange
event.description: Fires when a form changes

event.name: onforminput
event.description: Fires when a form gets user input

event.name: onfocusin
event.description: Fires immediately before an element receives focus.

event.name: onfocusout
event.description: Fires immediately after focus moves from the element to another element.

event.name: onhelp
event.description: Fires when a user presses the F1 key to activate help.

event.name: oninput
event.description: Fires when an element gets user input

event.name: oninvalid
event.description: Fires when an element is invalid

event.name: onkeydown
event.description: Fires when a user presses down on a key while the element has focus.

event.name: onkeypress
event.description: Fires when a user presses a key or holds down the key while the element has focus.

event.name: onkeyup
event.description: Fires when a user releases a key while the element has focus.

event.name: onlayoutcomplete
event.description: Fires when Print or Print Preview finishes laying out the content in a LayoutRect with the source data.

event.name: onload
event.description: Fires when the content of the element finishes loading.

event.name: onloadeddata
event.description: Fires when media data is loaded

event.name: onloadedmetadata
event.description: Fires when the duration and other media data of a media element is loaded

event.name: onloadstart
event.description: Fires when the browser starts to load the media data

event.name: onlosecapture
event.description: Fires when the element loses mouse capture.

event.name: onmousedown
event.description: Fires when a user clicks down on the mouse button while the element has focus.

event.name: onmouseenter
event.description: Fires when the mouse pointer enters the element.
event.remarks: Differs from onmouseover in that onmouseenter does not bubble and is not cancelable.

event.name: onmouseleave
event.description: Fires when the mouse pointer leaves the element.
event.remarks: Differs from onmouseout in that onmouseleave does not bubble and is not cancelable.

event.name: onmousemove
event.description: Fires when the mouse moves while the pointer over the element.

event.name: onmouseout
event.description: Fires when the mouse pointer moves off of the element.

event.name: onmouseover
event.description: Fires when the mouse pointer moves over the element.

event.name: onmouseup
event.description: Fires when the user releases the mouse button while the element has focus.

event.name: onmousewheel
event.description: Fires when the user rotates the mouse wheel while the element has focus.

event.name: onmove
event.description: Fires when the element moves.

event.name: onmoveend
event.description: Fires when the element stops moving.

event.name: onmovestart
event.description: Fires immediately before the element moves.

event.name: onpaste
event.description: Fires when the clipboard contents are pasted onto the element.

event.name: onpause
event.description: Fires when media data is paused

event.name: onplay
event.description: Fires when media data is going to start playing

event.name: onplaying
event.description: Fires when media data has started playing

event.name: onprogress
event.description: Fires when the browser is fetching the media data

event.name: onpropertychange
event.description: Fires when one of the properties of the element changes.

event.name: onratechange
event.description: Fires when the media data's playing rate has changed

event.name: onreadystatechange
event.description: Fires when the ready state of the element changes.

event.name: onreset
event.description: Fires when the form data is reset.

event.name: onresize
event.description: Fires immediately before an element is about to be resized.

event.name: onresizeend
event.description: Fires when the element is finished being resized.

event.name: onresizestart
event.description: Fires immediately before a user resizes the element.

event.name: onrowenter
event.description: Fires if the data values for the row change in the datasource.

event.name: onrowexit
event.description: Fires immediately before the data values for the row change in the datasource.

event.name: onrowsdelete
event.description: Fires immediately before rows are deleted from the dataset.

event.name: onrowsinserted
event.description: Fires immediately after rows are inserted into the dataset.

event.name: onscroll
event.description: Fires when a user scrolls the element.

event.name: onseeked
event.description: Fires when a media element's seeking attribute is no longer true, and the seeking has ended

event.name: onseeking
event.description: Fires when a media element's seeking attribute is true, and the seeking has begun

event.name: onselect
event.description: Fires when the element is selected.

event.name: onselectstart
event.description: Fires immediately before the element is selected.

event.name: onstart
event.description: Fires at the beginning of a loop for the looping content of an element.

event.name: onstalled
event.description: Fires when there is an error in fetching media data (stalled)

event.name: onsubmit
event.description: Fires when the form data is submitted.

event.name: onsuspend
event.description: Fires when the browser has been fetching media data, but stopped before the entire media file was fetched

event.name: ontimeerror
event.description: Fires when a time-related error occurs.

event.name: onunload
event.description: Fires when the content of the element finishes unloading.

event.name: onvolumechange
event.description: Fires when media changes the volume, also when volume is set to "mute"

event.name: onwaiting
event.description: Fires when media has stopped playing, but is expected to resume
